title: Should Iran's supreme leader Khamenei be worried? Donald Trump's response and a blunt warning
summary_full: President Trump issued a stern warning to Iran against restarting its nuclear program, threatening severe consequences if new facilities are established. He claimed US strikes had previously destroyed targeted nuclear sites, preventing Iran from accessing them and asserting that the country was close to developing a nuclear weapon.
